summary: HUNTIQ-V5 PHASE G P0-BETA2: 12 Behavioral Factors Integration - All tests PASS (70 unit + 21 API = 91 total). APIs /api/v1/bionic/territorial/score and /api/v1/bionic/behavioral/predict now support include_advanced_factors=true with 12 factors returned in metadata.advanced_factors. Version P0-beta2 confirmed.
passed_tests: 70/70 Unit tests pass (TestAdvancedFactors, TestAdvancedFactorsIntegration, TestPredictiveTerritorial, TestBehavioralModels)
metadata.version = P0-beta2 confirmed on both endpoints

metadata.advanced_factors contains all 12 factors (predation, thermal_stress, hydric_stress, social_stress, social_hierarchy, competition, weak_signals, hormonal, digestive, territorial_memory, adaptive_behavior, human_disturbance, mineral, snow)
Bear hibernation returns score=0 with BEAR_HIBERNATION_PERIOD warning
Rut period detection: hormonal.phase=rut_peak in October for moose
All 5 species supported (moose, deer, bear, wild_turkey, elk)
critical_code_review_comments: Data contracts updated: TerritorialScoreInput and BehavioralPredictionInput now include include_advanced_factors, snow_depth_cm, is_crusted fields
Router updated: POST endpoints now pass the 3 new P0-BETA2 parameters to the services

All 12 behavioral factors properly integrated: Predation, Stress (thermal/hydric/social), Social Hierarchy, Competition, Weak Signals, Hormonal Cycles, Digestive Cycles, Territorial Memory, Adaptive Behavior, Human Disturbance, Mineral Availability, Snow Conditions
Backward compatibility preserved: include_advanced_factors defaults to True but works when set to False
context_for_next_testing_agent: P0-BETA2 12 behavioral factors fully verified via API. Key endpoints: POST /api/v1/bionic/territorial/score and POST /api/v1/bionic/behavioral/predict. Use include_advanced_factors=true to get the 12 factors in metadata.advanced_factors. The 12 factors are: predation, thermal_stress, hydric_stress, social_stress, social_hierarchy, competition, weak_signals, hormonal, digestive, territorial_memory, adaptive_behavior, human_disturbance, mineral, snow. Snow conditions are handled via snow_depth_cm and is_crusted parameters.

backward_compatibility.include_advanced_factors_false: Returns response without advanced_factors in metadata

twelve_factors_summary.1_predation: PredatorRiskModel - wolf/bear risk by region and time
twelve_factors_summary.2_thermal_stress: StressModel - heat/cold stress thresholds by species
twelve_factors_summary.snow_conditions: SnowConditionModel - snow depth and crust impact
